markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Couatl](/Traits.aspx?ID=298)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 308 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

A family of supernatural feathered serpents who serve as guardians and messengers on the Material Plane for various good-aligned divinities.
name: Couatl
